name: Empty Chair
description:
STORY

Bayu woke up in the middle of the night, and he realized that he was in the school bathroom. Bayu remembers that he was supposed to be in the School Medical Room with the girl he loves, but Bayu forgot all about it after Bayu confessed his feelings to her this afternoon

Control

Move = W,A,S,D

Jump = Space

Run = Shift

Crouch = Ctrl

Prone = C

Examine = Q

Interact = E

Inventory = Tab

Pause = Esc

Look Around = Use Mouse

Tested on

-Windows 10

-Processor Intel Core i3-1115G4

-RAM 8GB DDR4

-GPU Intel UHD Graphics

-Storage SSD Sata 256GB (but, you just need 3,14GB available space for this game)
